SELECT ID,NAME,allname FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CI.ID, CI.CUST_NAME NAME , CI.CUST_NAME||'-['||nvl(ci1.cust_name,ci2.cust_name)||']' as allname
FROM CUST_INFO CI LEFT JOIN CUST_TYPE_INFO CTI ON(CI.ID=CTI.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO_DEALER CID ON (CI.ID=CID.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO_PERSON CIP ON (CI.ID=CIP.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO_COMPANY CIC ON (CI.ID=CIC.CUST_ID) left join cust_info ci1 on cip.dealer_company=ci1.id left join cust_info ci2 on cic.dealer_company=ci2.id WHERE CI.INVALID_='1' AND CI.DRAFT_='1' /~cust_id: AND UPPER(CI.ID) = UPPER('{cust_id}') ~/ /~cust_class: AND UPPER(CI.CUST_CLASS) = UPPER('{cust_class}') ~/ /~cust_class_m: AND (UPPER(CI.CUST_CLASS) = UPPER('{cust_class1}') or UPPER(CI.CUST_CLASS) = UPPER('{cust_class2}')) ~/ /~cooperate_status: AND UPPER(CID.COOPERATE_STATUS)=UPPER('{cooperate_status}') ~/ /~dealer_id: ---经销商 AND CID.CUST_ID='{dealer_id}' ~/ /~cust_dealer_id: ---客户经销商归属 AND CIC.DEALER_COMPANY||CIP.DEALER_COMPANY='{cust_dealer_id}' ~/ /~cust_type: AND UPPER(CTI.CUST_TYPE) = UPPER('{cust_type}') ~/ ) RS WHERE 1=1 /~currentRawValue: AND RS.NAME LIKE '%{currentRawValue}%'~/ ORDER BY RS.NAME DESC,RS.ID
